name: Hexahedroid
description:
A small Asteroid-like shooter in early development!

The game is currently in a state with endlessly spawning enemies on a fairly large destructible map and a handful of weapon types to play with.

A lot of things might and will change as it continues to develop.

Please leave a comment if you are experiencing any problems!

Features that can be expected soon (unordered):

  •  controller support
  •  progression
  •  power-ups
  •  more weapon types
  •  more enemy types
  •  bosses
  •  offline leaderboards
  •  better UI

 and more.

Install Instructions:

Just download unzip and run the .exe file : )

System Requirements:

  • OS:          windows 64 bit
  • CPU:         sse2 capable processor
  • Graphics:    OpenGL 3.3
